title: Enhancing Healthcare Practical Competencies: Gamification Problem-Centered Leadership Simulation: Social Sciences Domain

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and evaluate social problem-solving scenarios in VR-based simulations with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can establish collaborative strategies among team members using gamification mechanisms (experience points, leaderboards, reward systems).
After problem-based learning activities, learners can achieve a performance level of at least 3.5/4 points on average in formative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
